description.value:
Contains a Spork, Knife, and Collapsible mug inside a Clamshell container that doubles as the tray. Meals are often placed in the container, tightly closed, and dropped into an open fire to cook.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 5 T
